title: 89/114/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 December 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Spain pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 December 1988
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Spain pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(89/114/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The laws, regulations and administrative provisions in the Annex hereto, forwarded by the Spanish Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 797/85, satisfy the conditions for a Community financial contribution to the measures qualifying under that Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 108, 29. 4. 1988, p. 1.
